text: Children of God is a 2010 Bahamian romantic drama movie directed by Kareem Mortimer and starring Johnny Ferro, Margaret Laurena Kemp, Stephen Tyrone Williams, Van Brown, Mark Richard Ford, Craig Pinder. ==Other websites== * Category:2010 romantic drama movies Category:2010 LGBT movies Category:Bahamian movies Category:Movies about interracial romance
title: Children of God (movie)
